smile.title: Please enter the Smile ID
smile.find_id: You can find the Smile ID on the backside of your Smile-device.
smile.wrong_id: You entered a wrong Smile ID, please try again. The Smile ID is a word containing 8 lowercase letters.

stretch.title: Please enter the Plugwise ID
stretch.find_id: You can find the Plugwise ID on the frontside of your Plugwise-device.
stretch.wrong_id: You entered a wrong Plugwise ID, please try again. The Plugwise ID is a word containing 8 lowercase letters.
